CustomField.description: This is a Field to enter all Notes related to the Accounting of the Opportunity. Best Practice moving forward will be using the 'Notes' module and creating a New Note. Notes in the Notes module can be organized by date created, can contain relevant Titles, can be Shared + added to Records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a Field to enter all Notes related to the Accounting of the Opportunity. Best Practice moving forward will be using the 'Notes' module and creating a New Note. Notes in the Notes module can be organized by date created, can contain relevant Titles, can be Shared + added to Records.
CustomField.label: zNote - Accounting
